breadcrumbs.title: Register a vehicle for LEZ and ULEZ

texts: You can add up to 10 vehicles to each application (uploading a maximum of 50 files altogether). We can only accept vehicles of the same type in a single application - for example, if you have registered a car for ULEZ, you can only register cars as part of this registration.
If you want to register other types of vehicle you will need to submit a separate application.
We aim to process your registration within 10 working days. We will email you with the outcome.
In the meantime, if you drive in the ULEZ or the LEZ you need to pay any charges your vehicle is liable for.
